returns._0: The number of decimals used by the price feed

params._token: The token address to get price data for

returns._3: updatedAt When the price was last updated

params._token: The token address to get the price feed for

decimals(address).notice: Returns the number of decimals for a token's price feed

latestRoundData(address).notice: Returns the latest price data for a token in Chainlink format
